description:
Task #5: Improve frontend test coverage from 49.74% to 80%+

Current Status:
- Backend coverage: 99.4% (excellent)
- Frontend coverage: 49.74% (below target)

Files needing tests:
- frontend/lib/api.ts (0% coverage)
- frontend/lib/authToken.ts (0% coverage)  
- frontend/hooks/useAuth.tsx (0% coverage)
- frontend/app/(auth)/ pages (low coverage)

Requirements:
- Target coverage: 80%+ for each file
- Test framework: Jest + React Testing Library
- Test scenarios: Success cases, error handling, edge cases
- All tests must pass

Use beta-qa for test generation. Can leverage codex exec for efficiency.
